thread.title: Future Releases New Album 'HNDRXX' Featuring The Weeknd and Rihanna | Billboard
thread.title_full: Future Releases New Album 'HNDRXX' Featuring The Weeknd and Rihanna | Billboard

title: Future Releases New Album 'HNDRXX' Featuring The Weeknd and Rihanna | Billboard
text:
Andrew Lipovsky/NBC Future performs on The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon on Feb. 21, 2017. 
What do you do when your latest album is sailing toward the summit of the Billboard 200? If you’re Future , you go and release another album. 
The Atlanta rapper promised and delivered HNDRXX , which features guest spots from The Weeknd ( “ Coming Out Strong”) and Rihanna ("Selfish") and arrives just one week after the release of his self-titled studio set. 
Future is chasing a piece of chart history. As previously reported, his Future LP could debut at No. 1 on the March 11-dated survey with roughly 150,000 equivalent units. If HNDRXX performs just as well, he’ll become the first act to debut at No. 1 in consecutive frames. 
HNDRXX , like Future , was released through A-1/Freebandz/Epic Records and runs to 17 tracks. Stream it below.
